headline: Amgen Drops 7% After A 'Big Unknown Risk' Rattles Its Monthly Obesity Shot
summary: Amgen stock tumbled late Tuesday on a report its high-profile weight-loss shot, MariTide, could be linked to bone mineral density loss.
